name: gifwrap
description: A Jimp-compatible library for working with GIFs

scripts.docs: jsdoc2md --plugin dmd-clear --template templates/README.hbs src/index.js src/gif.js src/bitmapimage.js src/gifframe.js src/gifutil.js src/gifcodec.js > README.md
